name: pihole-admin
title: Pi-hole Admin
description: Manage your Pi-hole v6 directly from Raycast
author: vandertoorm

commands.name: status
commands.title: View Status
commands.description: Show Pi-hole general status and statistics

commands.name: enable-disable
commands.title: Manage Blocking
commands.description: Enable or disable Pi-hole DNS blocking

commands.name: query-log
commands.title: Query Log
commands.description: Examine recent DNS query logs and activity

commands.name: top-domains
commands.title: Top Domains
commands.description: View most queried and blocked domains

commands.name: add-domain
commands.title: Add Domain
commands.subtitle: Pi-hole
commands.description: Add a domain to whitelist or blacklist

commands.name: flush-logs
commands.title: Flush Logs
commands.description: Clear all query logs and history

preferences.name: pihole_url
preferences.title: Pi-hole URL
preferences.description: Complete URL of your Pi-hole instance (e.g., http://192.168.1.100 or https://pi.hole)

preferences.name: verify_ssl
preferences.title: Verify SSL Certificate
preferences.description: Verify SSL certificates when using HTTPS
preferences.label: Verify SSL certificates

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
